products.name: Neckband Bladeless Lazy Fan Neck Hanging Cooler USB Rechargeable - White
products.description: This Neckband Bladeless Lazy Fan Neck Hanging Cooler USB Rechargeable - White is designed for your comfort and convenience! It is perfect for use when you are outdoors, exercising, or simply relaxing at home. With its unique design, this fan will keep you cool without getting in the way of your activities. It is easy to use, rechargeable, and has a long battery life. You can wear it around your neck, hang it from a hook, or place it on a flat surface. It is lightweight and portable, making it ideal for travel.
